posts.post_content: I am looking for G-VG examples (MK is ok), preferably raw, of HOF's with mid-tier backs (AB 350/460, Cycle 350/460, EPDG, Hindu, Sov460, Tolstoi).  Poor is okay as long as the image is presentable, and only slight paper loss on the back.  Please email me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] if interested in selling.  Thanks, Tom
Check out mine in the store below. Thx!
Bump...any help would be greatly appreciated.

Bump....especially looking for the following HOF's with difficult backs.

Bender
Brown
Chance
Cobb
Crawford
Evers
Lajoie
Speaker
Tinker
Waddell
Willis

Thanks,

Tom
